name: Athey & Luca: Economists in Tech
description: JEP article on 'Economists (and Economics) in Tech Companies' - foundational reading on why tech hires economists.

name: Levels.fyi Compensation
description: Crowdsourced tech compensation data. Compare salaries across companies, levels, locations. Essential for understanding tech pay.

name: Amazon Science Blog
description: How Amazon's economics team works, research culture, and publications. Window into tech economist daily work.

name: Scarlet Chen: Econ PhD to Tech
description: Stanford PhD to Google/Shopify. Interview experiences at Google, Amazon, Facebook, Uber. 4-part comprehensive guide.

name: Ace the Data Science Interview
description: 201 real questions from FAANG, startups, Wall Street. Industry-standard prep resource covering role expectations.

name: Amazon Economist Careers
description: Dedicated Economist job family with RFCA (reduced-form), STRUC (structural), FMF (forecasting) tracks. Largest economist employer.

name: Google Research Areas
description: Economists hired as Quantitative Analyst, Data Scientist, or Research Scientist. No dedicated 'Economist' title but similar work.

name: Meta Core Data Science
description: Economics team within CDS focused on experimentation, causal inference, pricing, market design. Title: Research Scientist, Economics.

name: Uber Ubernomics Team
description: Pioneer of tech economist hiring. Dedicated Economist and Applied Scientist (Econ) roles for pricing, incentives, policy.

name: Wayfair Economics Group
description: ~15 PhD economists from MIT, Harvard, Northwestern. Explicit 'Economist' title and intern positions. Strong for applied micro.

name: LinkedIn Economic Graph
description: Studies labor market dynamics using LinkedIn data. Chief Economist Karin Kimbrough. Contact: EconomicGraphResearchProposal@linkedin.com

name: Stripe Economics of AI Fellowship
description: Chief Economist Ernie Tedeschi. $10K+ grants for academic economists. Partners with Stanford on research.

name: Salesforce AI Economist
description: Unique project combining AI and economics for economic policy optimization. Publications at NeurIPS, ICML.

name: Pharma HEOR Teams Overview
description: Biostatistics, VEO (Value Evidence Outcomes), RWE (Real-World Evidence) teams. 200+ statisticians at Lilly, Pfizer, Roche.

name: Rose Tan: Tech Jobs for Econ PhDs
description: LinkedIn guide on navigating tech's job market. Networking tips, role types, expectations. Key advice: don't be first economist.

name: Key Advice: Title vs Tasks
description: 'Data Scientist', 'Economist', 'Applied Scientist' can involve similar work. Title matters less than team and tasks.

name: Industry Experience Preferences
description: Netflix prefers candidates with industry experience. Most others hire fresh PhDs. Internships are crucial - 'not possible to do too many'.

name: NABE TEC Conference
description: Largest causal inference conference for tech economists (~800 participants). Free for job market PhDs. Nov 9-11 Seattle 2025.

name: AEA JOE Listings
description: Tech companies post here: Amazon, Google, Microsoft, Uber, Airbnb, Wayfair, Stripe. Most DS roles on LinkedIn instead.

name: StatTrak Biostatistics Internships
description: ASA comprehensive list of pharma biostatistics internships with deadlines. Updated annually.

name: EuropeanHealthEconomics Jobs
description: HEOR job postings for pharma and consulting. European and global positions.

name: Amazon PhD Internship
description: Formal 11-12 week program, year-round rolling applications. Dedicated Economist job family - largest in tech.

name: Google PhD Programs
description: Research Intern PhD (12-14 weeks) and Student Researcher PhD (12-24 weeks). PhD Fellowship available.

name: Meta Research Scientist
description: Research Scientist Internship 12-24 weeks. Applications open early fall. Core Data Science Economics team.

name: Microsoft Research Careers
description: MSR Research Internship (pure research) and PhD Product Internship (applied). Most academic-like environment in FAANG+.

name: Apple ML Research
description: ML Research Internships. No visible Economist team - requires pivot to ML/Data Science roles. Apple Scholars fellowship (invite-only).

name: Uber Applied Scientist
description: PhD Applied Scientist Internship 12 weeks with Economics PhD track. Dedicated Economist roles. Founded with John List.

name: Lyft Economics Team
description: Economics Team PhD internships $56-62/hour in SF/NYC. Academic publication culture with John List collaboration.

name: Wayfair Economist Intern
description: Explicit Economist Intern and Data Science Intern ($65/hour). ~15 PhD economists. Staff Economist $207-230K.

name: Airbnb Data Science
description: Data Science Internship with Inference track (Master's & PhD only, 12 weeks). Application window: December-February.

name: DoorDash Data Science
description: ML, Operations Research, and Data Science PhD internships (12 weeks, $2,200-2,600/week). Explicitly includes Economists.

name: Instacart ML PhD
description: ML PhD internships. Economists join as Data Scientists - pricing team has Econ PhDs.

name: eBay Data Science
description: Data Science internships available. Less emphasis on dedicated economist roles.

name: Etsy DSML Research
description: Data Science Intern ($70-75/hr), Research PhD Intern. Marketplace Economics projects. DSML team.

name: LinkedIn Applied Research
description: Applied Research Internship 12 weeks. Economic Graph Research Program studies labor markets.

name: Spotify Research Scientist
description: Research Scientist PhD Internship 10-12 weeks (NYC or London). Explicitly welcomes Economics PhDs. Feb 5, 2026 deadline.

name: Netflix Research
description: ML/AI Scientist Intern PhD. Prefers candidates with industry experience. Public Policy Economists (SEAL team) separate track.

name: Pinterest Labs
description: PhD ML and PhD Data Science internships ($12,100/month). Economics PhD accepted.

name: Discord Data Science
description: Data Science Intern - ML, Causal Inference ($78-90/hour for PhD). Seasonal postings, no formal PhD program.

name: Snap Research
description: Snap Research Internship 16-24 weeks. Less economics focus, more CV/ML.

name: Stripe PhD Internship
description: PhD Data Scientist Intern, PhD ML Engineer Intern (12-16 weeks). Chief Economist. Economics of AI Fellowship.

name: PayPal PhD Intern
description: Data Scientist PhD Intern, ML Scientist PhD Intern ($41-61/hour). Global Analytics & Data Science (GADS). Risk focus.

name: Robinhood Data Scientist
description: Data Scientist Intern (Master's or PhD). 48-hour take-home challenge. A/B testing and experimentation emphasis.

name: Affirm Careers
description: Strong credit risk and quantitative markets roles. SWE internship exists but no formal PhD pipeline.

name: Block (Square) Careers
description: Focus on software engineering. No visible economist roles or research team.

name: Adobe Research Internship
description: Hundreds of PhD interns annually. 12 research areas. Strong mentorship. Apply: research-internship-phd@adobe.com

name: Salesforce AI Research
description: AI Research Intern minimum 12 weeks. AI Economist project. Publications at NeurIPS, ICML, ACL.

name: Databricks Research
description: PhD GenAI Research Scientist Intern, Data Science Intern. Explicitly accepts Economics PhDs. Causal inference focus.

name: Intuit AI Research
description: AI Research Intern, AI Science Intern. Fintech AI applications. Contact: ai-research@intuit.com

name: Eli Lilly Statistics
description: 12-week Statistics Internship. Global Statistical Sciences (200+ statisticians). Deadline: January 4, 2026.

name: Pfizer Biostatistics
description: 12-week program, 15+ positions. Biostatistics (200+ statisticians), HV&E (HEOR). Deadline: January 30, 2026.

name: J&J Statistics
description: Statistics & Decision Sciences Intern (8-10 positions, Spring House PA, Titusville NJ). Deadline: February 16, 2026.

name: Moderna Biostatistics
description: Biostatistics Intern 10-12 weeks, Cambridge MA. mRNA clinical development focus.

name: Roche Global Biostatistics
description: Biostatistics PhD Summer Internship (UK: 10 weeks). 600+ statisticians globally. HEOR team.

name: Genentech E4A/HEOR
description: 10-12 week summer internships. Posting window November-March. Biostatistics, Evidence for Access (E4A), Translational AI Lab.

name: Optum HEOR
description: Optum AI PhD Intern (remote available). HEOR team for life sciences data analytics.

name: Roblox Virtual Economy
description: Data Scientist - PhD Intern, Applied Scientist - PhD Intern (12-16 weeks, $60-64/hour). Explicitly hires Economics PhDs for virtual economy.

name: OpenAI Residency
description: 6-month full-time Residency (NOT internship). For career changers and early researchers. Networking essential.

name: Anthropic Careers
description: Explicitly states 'We do not offer internships'. Full-time only as Member of Technical Staff. ~50% have PhDs. Networking very essential.

name: Notion Careers
description: No formal PhD program. General internships accept PhD students. 12-week project-focused.

name: NABE TEC Job Fair
description: Free registration for economics PhDs on the job market. Resume deadline Sep 17 (first batch), Oct 5 (final). Amazon, Google, Netflix, Stripe recruit.

name: Takeda-UIC HEOR Fellowship
description: 2-year Health Economics and Outcomes Research fellowship program. Strong for pharma career path.

name: DeepMind Student Researcher
description: Student Researcher Program for PhD students. Research collaborations with academic mentors.

name: DataLemur SQL
description: Free SQL practice with FAANG questions. Created by ex-Facebook authors of Ace the Data Science Interview.

name: StrataScratch
description: Company-specific SQL filtering for Airbnb, Uber, Netflix. Real interview questions with solutions.

name: Window Functions Practice
description: Interactive quizzes on ROW_NUMBER, RANK, LAG/LEAD. Consistently tested in interviews.

name: Interview Query
description: Data science interview platform with SQL, Python, and ML questions. Take-home challenges included.

name: Nick Singh's 40 Stats Questions
description: Probability and statistics questions from FAANG and Wall Street. Bayesian puzzles and distributions.

name: StatQuest with Josh Starmer
description: Best resource for econ PhDs learning ML. Bias-variance, regularization, ensemble methods explained accessibly.

name: Trustworthy Online Controlled Experiments
description: The industry bible by Kohavi, Tang, Xu. Design, analysis, pitfalls from Microsoft/LinkedIn/Google leaders.

name: Understanding CUPED
description: Bridges CUPED to DiD and regression. Essential for industry A/B testing interviews.

name: Netflix: Quasi Experimentation
description: When A/B tests aren't feasible and how Netflix handles SUTVA violations.

name: Emma Ding: Product Sense Guide
description: Ultimate guide to business case interviews. AARRR framework, metrics, diagnostic approaches.

name: Amplitude: North Star Metrics
description: Three games framework: Attention, Transaction, Productivity. Real examples from Facebook, Airbnb, Spotify.

name: DataLemur Meta DS Guide
description: 31 leaked Meta interview questions. Product sense and SQL focus.

name: Scarlet Ink: Amazon LP Guide
description: Written by ex-Amazon Bar Raiser. Sent by recruiters to candidates. 100+ candidates credit it for getting hired.

name: Amazon Leadership Principles
description: Official 16 principles with explanations. Customer Obsession, Ownership, Invent and Simplify, etc.

name: Interviewing.io Amazon Guide
description: Insights from 500+ mock Amazon behavioral interviews. STARI method with Action at 50-60%.

name: IGotAnOffer: Google Behavioral
description: Googleyness traits: comfort with ambiguity, bias for action, intellectual humility.

name: Designing Machine Learning Systems
description: Essential ML system design book by Chip Huyen. Based on Stanford CS 329S.

name: ML System Design Interview (Alex Xu)
description: 7-step framework with 10 detailed solutions: visual search, video recommendation, ad prediction.

name: ML Interviews GitHub
description: 7.2k stars. Created by someone with offers from Meta, Google, Amazon, Apple for Applied Scientist.

name: Chip Huyen ML Interviews Book
description: 200+ knowledge questions organized by difficulty for ML fundamentals.

name: Interview Query Take-Homes
description: 23 real take-home challenges from Airbnb, Stripe, Uber, DoorDash, Amazon with solutions.

name: Levels.fyi Negotiation Guide
description: Guide on base, equity, bonus structures and how to negotiate each.

name: Candor Salary Negotiation
description: Strategies tech insiders use. Competing offers, leveling, avoiding leaving money on the table.
